title: Amy Schumer posts heartwarming Instagram snaps with baby Gene as he turns five months old
text:
Her baby son Gene is now five months old.

And Amy Schumer marked the occasion on Saturday with a heartwarming Instagram album of her cradling her child close to her.

The 38-year-old wrote: '5 months today and like all moms I love him so much it hurts. Im feeling strong and good and like I’m still a human being with interests and ambitions and goals I’m excited to reach.'

So sweet: Her baby son Gene is now five months old, and Amy Schumer marked the occasion on Saturday with a heartwarming Instagram album of her cradling her child

She added: 'It’s felt good to be back at work. I was so worried about it and was afraid to go back after he was 3 months old. A couple days I’ve cried from missing him.'

Amy went on: 'But it’s mostly good to be back and the breaks energize me to be a better mom and appreciate our time even more.'

She closed out: 'I have it a lot easier than many people but I wanted to share my experience. what was your going back to work experience?'

A day earlier, she posted a snap of her looking alarmed as she sat on the toilet in the bathroom of Jerry Seinfeld's wife Jessica.

'Back at work': The 38-year-old wrote: 'Im feeling strong and good and like I’m still a human being with interests and ambitions and goals I’m excited to reach'

She wrote in the caption of the funny photograph: '#tbt the day I found out I was pregnant in @jessseinfeld bathroom'.

Amy was trolled online for taking the stage at the iconic Comedy Cellar in Manhattan two weeks after she gave birth to Gene on May 5.

She posted a snapshot the next day of herself pumping breast milk, writing: 'Sending out love to the moms shaming me for doing standup last night!'

'The day I found out I was pregnant': A day earlier, she posted a snap of her looking alarmed as she sat on the toilet in the bathroom of Jerry Seinfeld's wife Jessica

In August she posted that she was getting ready to go 'back to work,' next to a snap of her asleep on the couch with her child.

Amy was candid on social media about the health issues she underwent during her pregnancy as a result of hyperemesis gravidarum.

The Duchess Of Cambridge dealt with hyperemesis gravidarum during each of her three pregnancies, increasing public awareness of the condition.
description: Her baby son Gene is now five months old. And Amy Schumer marked the occasion on Saturday with a heartwarming Instagram album of her cradling her child close to her.
